interpretation:
The nose emoji represents the sense of smell and the ability to detect subtle changes in one's environment. This card may indicate heightened intuition or a need to trust one's instincts. It can also signify a need to pay attention to the details and nuances in a situation. 

In a reading, the nose card may suggest that the querent needs to trust their gut instincts or pay closer attention to their surroundings. It could also indicate a need to be more discerning or cautious in their interactions with others. Alternatively, it may signify a need to appreciate the small things in life or to take pleasure in the simple pleasures of the senses. Overall, the nose card invites the querent to be more attuned to their environment and to trust their inner guidance.
